text:
Chris Reed (July 7, 1989 – March 14, 2020) was an American-born Japanese ice dancer. With his sister Cathy Reed, he became a seven-time Japanese national champion (2008–2011, 2013–2015) and the 2011 Asian Winter Games silver medalist.
They competed at two Winter Olympics (2010, 2014) and reached the final segment at nine ISU Championships.
On March 14, 2020, Reed died of sudden cardiac arrest in Detroit, Michigan at the age of 30.
